data.text: Spoilt,  and in a good way. Hotel was special, our room was spot on and staff were so polite and welcoming in particular in the restaurants,  big thank you to Abhi, Mayank, Dipenty, Pahi and especially Rajeev. Would highly recommend and would definitely return.
data.title: Great hotel

data.text: Another fantastic stay. Staff are attentive and nothing is too much bother. Hotel is excellent value for money compared to some hotels. The breakfasts offer excellent choice and we enjoyed pizza and a few snack lunches which were also very tasty and fairly good value for money. Hopefully next time we return the waterpark will finally be open!
data.title: Ideal location & excellent as always.

data.text:
Excellent spacious accommodation in heart of Dubai . The rooms are big with all amenities . Located centrally with easy access to all sites . It has a swimming pool , gym on site . Restaurant in Grand Hyatt can be availed . The apartment has some big clean rooms and a big kitchen . 
The staff are courteous and helpful . 
Taxi is available at the front .
All in all a perfect place to stay if you are a big group .
data.title: Excellent Aparthotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 679ssaml,

Thank you for sharing your recent experience with Grand Hyatt Residence.

We are very glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay and that you found our amenities and rooms excellent. Your kind comments about our courteous staff have been noted and we will pass down the comments.

We are also very delighted to hear that the rooms were upto your expectations and the staff proved to be helpful .

We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Warm Regards,
Natalia Zitarosa,
Residence manager
owner_response.author: Fathi Khogaly

data.text:
Travelling internationally, have stayed here twice for short stays with young children and booked a third visit. Stayed in two bedroom apartment. Although a bit dated, they’re clean and functional, with lots of space and free wifi. Staff are very friendly and responsive. Accessing restaurants etc in hotel is easy and very convenient. Outdoor pools are fantastic for children. Dedicated children’s water park is undergoing renovation but children’s pool still available. 
Highly recommend.
data.title: Excellent family accommodation near airport

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear igm76,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on your stay at Grand Hyatt Dubai Residence. 

We are delighted to hear that you have repeatedly chosen to stay with us and have enjoyed the fantastic children's swimming pool and the convenience of our facilities. It's wonderful to learn that you had a positive experience with our attentive staff, and we will certainly share your kind words with the team.

Your comments about the aging apartment have been duly noted, and we will work towards addressing these areas for improvement. 

We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Warm Regards,
Natalia Zitarosa
Residence Manager
owner_response.author: Fathi Khogaly

data.text:
We have stayed at the Grand Hyatt a few times now and there is a reason for it. The hotel is very well run and all the staff you encounter are polite, greet you with a smile and are very helpful. The rooms are spacious, well furnished and the beds comfortable.
The management clearly have a well developed strategy that delivers a consistently high customer experience. We have never been disappointed whenever we have stayed here.
It’s always difficult singling out team members, however Rajeev and Vinod in The Market Cafe have always looked after us and are extremely professional, along with  Asmi,Abhi,Sughand and Alissa who were also attentive.
data.title: Consistently good.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear KKJ1972,

Thank you for leaving us with an excellent rating and review.

We are delighted to learn that you have consistently had a positive experience at Grand Hyatt Dubai.

Our team takes pride on delivering exceptional service, so it is really encouraging to receive such favorable feedback. Kindly note that your compliments will definitely be passed onto the team.

Thank you for your continued patronage in choosing to stay at Grand Hyatt Dubai, when in Dubai. 

We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Warm Regards,
Natalia Zitarosa
Residence Manager
owner_response.author: Fathi Khogaly
